table.name: invoice_equipment_seal
table.description: The imprinted serial number of a 'one use' locking device the shipper places to prohibit access to the cargo.  The consignee must destroy the device to remove it.

columns.name: SEQ_NUMBER
columns.description: Internal database sequence number related to each equipment seal.

columns.name: SEAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number for equipment that has been sealed.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
